sentence: Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 30, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $1.03 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 14, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased HD prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 15.73% increase over prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $186.85, the dividend yield is 2.2%.
The previous trading day's last sale of HD was $186.85, representing a -10% decrease from the 52 week high of $207.61 and a 29.53% increase over the 52 week low of $144.25.
HD is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ) and Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ).
HD's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $7.69.
Zacks Investment Research reports HD's forecasted earnings growth in 2019 as 26.68%, compared to an industry average of 25.8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the HD Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
